text: waladhi nazal min alsama' mtrana bqdr, lays twfanana mghrqana wala qasrana ean alhajt; hataa yakun meashana lakum wlaneamkm, fa'ahyayna bialma' baldat muqfirat min alnbat, kama 'akhrajna bhdha alma' aladhi nazalnah min alsama' min hadhih albaldat almaytat alnbat walzre, tukhrajwn- 'ayuha alnas- min qbwrkm baed fnaykm
